resources.string: It is one of the ten gates constructed by Maharaja Narendra Singh to fortify Patiala.
From bronze glasses to kettles, this museum houses the very varied and unique collection of the long lost era.
Amusement and water park. It has live wide variety of swings and waterfalls and good quality environment
Good range for fish aquarium, fishes. They have good knowledge about their work.
Deer park is a good place to see & know about different animals & birds there
Oldest garden in the city, Baradari means it has twelve doors /entries. The garden plays live music. There are rides for children in the garden
It is one of best institution for engineering.The atmosphere inside the college is awesome. There are lots of places to hangout and enjoy.
Netaji Subhas National Institute of Sports(NIS) is the Best place in India for Athletic and for all sports
Qila Mubarak is an ancient fortress of Sikh architecture. Qila Mubarak complex is built in 10-acre (40,000 m2) ground in the heart of the city.
The mahal contains a large number of frescoes, most of which were made under His Highness Maharaja Narinder Singh. A lake in front of the palace adds to the beauty.

Shri Guru Tegh Bahadur visited Lehal on 24 January 1672 and stayed under a banyan tree by the side of a pond. The sickness in the village subsided. The site where Guru Tegh Bahadur had sat came to be known as Dukh Nivaran
This holy place was build because here Shri Guru Tegh Bahadur stayed for 3 Months
It covers an area of 2 km2. The fort is enclosed within two rounded walls and a moat. A sum of ten lakh rupees was spent on its construction. that time
It was built by the Maharaja of Patiala in 1936. Today, the temple is situated opposite the Baradari Gardens.
This place is very popular for it\'s Non-Vegetarian dishes and Butter Naan
The name is enough in the city. The best sweets are sold here. Quality of the food is very good and fresh.
Best dishes at a very decent prices and good quality Indian food, Bakery Items and Chinese Food.
A great place to hangout with family and friends great menu and great service.
This is the place where celebrities come over to stay in this Royal City. It was build in the 19th century and the quality is maintained since than.
Barbeque Nation is an Indian restaurant chain headquartered in Bengaluru. The branch in Patiala was opened in 2017.
Stylish chain restaurant serving Mughlai, Punjabi and dishes from India\'s Northwestern frontier.
The only market which have all shops related to clothes and other wearables
The only market which have all shops related to shoes
We can get all type of National and International Authors Books
The only destination to do everything you want with food, playzone, shopping and cinema at a single place
All kind of shops which includes Restraunts,Mobile Showrooms,Ielts Institute etc
